org.apache.hadoop.mapred.buffer.impl
Class JSnapshotBuffer.Snapshot

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.mapred.buffer.impl.JSnapshotBuffer.Snapshot
Enclosing class:
JSnapshotBuffer<K,V>
public class JSnapshotBuffer.Snapshot
extends java.lang.Object

Contains the data and index files making up the snapshot. Each snapshot is tagged with a given progress. This class manages all snapshots taken from the output of a given task. For now, this class only keeps track of the most recent data and index snapshot files.
